channel.title: Logbook glitch (why does title need 15 characters making it unnecessarily long)
channel.description:
#### What happened? Opened logbook, got something interesting. Had to leave and reconnect since it wouldn't go away
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Just should show my logbook like normal
#### Steps to reproduce: If i recall correctly, someone was getting upped and I got bled that day or was bleeding (can't remember which)
#### Comments:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/quzdpu7krmti9d9/output_log%282%29.txt?dl=0 https://imgur.com/a/QZzkVwX

What happened? Opened logbook, got something interesting. Had to leave and reconnect since it wouldn’t go away

What was SUPPOSED to happen? Just should show my logbook like normal

Steps to reproduce: If i recall correctly, someone was getting upped and I got bled that day or was bleeding (can’t remember which)
